Great sense of humour!

Valve, Where the hell is Portal 3?

ตอนจบมีน้ำตาซึมนิดๆเพราะไอเกมแก้ปริศนาเนี่ยแหละ ตัวเกมดีกว่าภาคแรกทุกแง่ เนื้อเรื่อง,กราฟฟิค,เกมเพล์,ตัวละคร,ฉาก ทำให้ภาคแรกเหมือนเป็นเดโมไปเลย ถ้าใครชอบเล่นเกมแก้ปริศนาผมแนะนำเกมนี้เลย หรือจะพาเพื่อนมา co-op ปวดหัวด้วยกันก็ได้นะ น้ำมะนาว/10 (เกมมีระบบ remote play ซื้อเกมมาคนเดียวเล่นได้สองคน)
У тебя могут наблюдаться незначительные серьезнейшие повреждения мозга.
i hadnt seen any gameplay of portal or played it till last week but it was probly my best decision yet its definetly helping me through the coronavirus

Пример отличного сиквела, очень веселая головоломка с отличным юмором на 8+ часов, единственное по чему я скучаю так это по давящей атмосфере одиночества из 1-ого портала, но с ней игра была бы совсем другой
10\10
like puzles? Like action? you had it on puzles. Portal 2
lovely game. only game i play on steam for extensive periods. Those lovely 168hrs was filled with joy and anger and depression.

双倍的敌人，双倍的流程，双倍的快乐
wheatly这个白痴差点让整个游戏变成搞笑游戏了，最后还有glados唱歌真是太棒了
就是解密这边，本作的跳下悬崖积攒动量然后斜抛出去的部分是不是太多了点？有点审美疲劳了
норм но было классно  еслибы  можно было  больше чем 2 игрока

Everything's happening in abandoned aperture laboratories and in aperture science innovators laboratories. 
Glados core called Whiteley becomes your friend and after it he takes Glados body and you need to stop him and run out of aperture.
New features:
[list] 
    [*]Game has better graphics and it has new menu design.
    [*]You can create your own test chambers and upload them to steam workshop. 
    [*]There're new mechanisms these make walkthrough of game more interesting.
[/list]
Also here's my first test chamber:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2031143434
非常棒的游戏，和朋友一起玩很有意思，单人也通关了。有小伙半的推荐买来一起玩，是双人游戏哦
有趣 可以練習動頭腦
После игры в кооп потерял друга, рекомендую!

Sehr schönes Spiel. Gerade der Mutliplayer ist sehr empfehlenswert und ein guter Zeitvertreib zu 2. Die Story ist außerdem sehr schön erzählt und hat seinen ganz eigenen Style. Ist ein muss für jede gute Steam-Bibliothek und kann ich nur jedem ans Herz legen.
çok güzel bu oyun benim için bir undertale duygusu
Zaručeně doporučuji. Moje nejoblíbenější hra a podlě mě i 1 z nejlepších her kdy vůbec!
Just finished the coop mode in 3 hours and my brain expanded 3 sizes
Um dos melhores jogos co-op offiline para se jogar. Estilo puzzle que é desafiador mas não tão difícil. Recomendo muito caso tenha um amigo para concluir os LVLs.  Podiam lançar Portal 3 hehe
first portal was amazing. this one is absolute trash
Играл данную игру когда был малой и сейчас зайдя у меня чуть не свело олдсудскулы. Очень интересная игра всем советую.
Maravilhoso  o  jogo,  um  dos  melhores.
Speedy thing goes in, speedy thing comes out!

BUT theres something that i didnt like.. the first tests are from Portal I didnt like it yes its cool but ttheres another game that already have these tests (Portal). So they added the Perpetual Testing Initative that is really good my own rate is 9/10 I Hıghly Reccomend this game its 18,50 TL on my country Bye.

Bardzo przyjemna i ciekawa gra, jedynym minusem jak dla mnie jest dziwny sposob sterowania w edytorze komory testowej co powoduje ze czesto ciezko projektuje się niektore elementy.
Plus loin, plus haut, plus fort que le premier épisode ! Et depuis plus rien, merci Valve.
非常有趣，花了两天时间通关了，可惜没有合作伙伴玩双人版
игра крутая, сюжет захватывающий. Купил Portal Bundle за 30руб так как скидочка была. Прошёл Portal 1 за 1 день, сюжет плохой, игра не крутая, но ради интереса прошёл. Portal 1 сложнее чем Portal 2
Un clásico. Muy buen juego a pesar de los años.
A treasure of a game, practically endless playtime from community levels, replayable, there’s not much to hate
One of the best games I've ever played, Portal 2 is worth every penny. I highly recommend this game!
very Good. i love glados she's chaostic
desafios muito legais co-op muito bom
Cant believe I waited this long to play this game one of the best I have played in years don't hesitate to pick it up

Game lindo e com trilha sonora genial!
Jogo pelo menos uma vez por ano! Super recomendo.
Thought I would be too dumb for this game, but to my great surprise, I am.
O jogo é ótimo, mas não tem legendas completas em português do Brasil, só algumas coisas são traduzidas em PT-BR, o que é bem estranho.
I love this game and it is even better when playing co-op!

Best game I've played in the First Person in an extremely long time. Thought provoking puzzles, engaging characters and a well developed sense of closure at the end.

GLaDoS is a joy to have back, and is hilariously savage, the new character is a complete spoon, but also enjoyable to work with/against/for/etc. 

All in all, I'd love there to be a Portal 3, but that might be dreaming.

C'est une des franchises Valve qu'il faut absolument dans sa bibliothèque. Valve a bien joué son coup, les graphismes sont très évolutif du 1 au 2. Le concept était juste génial à sa sortie ! Il le reste encore aujourd'hui.  La narration du deux est bien mieux travailler que le un à titre de comparaison. Attention, il faut avoir jouer au premier afin de suivre plus facilement sur le deux. C'est un jeu de fou !
双人合作的关卡设计很精彩，所需求的配合度很高，和朋友玩其乐无穷
